articles.author: Jacob Zinkula
articles.title: Everyone's been wrong about inflation, and it's costing workers in salary negotiations - msnNOW
articles.description: Americans have been underestimating inflation. They could be missing out on higher wages as a result.
articles.content: Americans keep waiting for inflation to return to normal levels. But that wait has taken longer than expected, and it could be among the reasons wages have fallen well behind inflation over the past … [+5259 chars]

articles.title: Congenital anomalies during the 2015–2018 Zika virus epidemic: a population-based cross-sectional study - BMC Public Health - BMC Public Health
articles.description: Background Congenital anomalies are associated with several clinical and epidemiological complications. Following the Zika epidemic onset in Latin America, the incidence of congenital anomalies increased in Brazil. This study aimed to determine the frequency …
